parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets the data for hiding. objectWhereHide can be taken using [[findCover]]. hidePosition can be taken using [[getHideFrom]]. Command is not functional in Arma 2.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is not implemented!</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> object '''setHideBehind''' [objectWhereHide, hidePosition]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> objectWhereHide: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> hidePosition: [[Array]] - format [[getHideFrom]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> -

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getHideFrom]], [[findCover]], [[isHidden]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofpe</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
